componentList.name: LyField

directiveList.name: LyNativeControl
directiveList.selector: 'input[lyInput], textarea[lyInput], input[lyNativeControl], textarea[lyNativeControl], select[lyNativeControl]'

directiveList.name: LyHint
directiveList.selector: 'ly-field > ly-hint'

directiveList.name: LyLabel
directiveList.selector: 'ly-field > ly-label'

directiveList.name: LyPlaceholder
directiveList.selector: 'ly-field > ly-placeholder'

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -2

variableList.name: DEFAULT_APPEARANCE
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_APPEARANCE = "standard"

variableList.name: DEFAULT_WITH_COLOR
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_WITH_COLOR = "primary"

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -2

variableList.name: inputText
variableList.children:
const inputText = [
  'text',
  'number',
  'password',
  'search',
  'tel',
  'url'
]

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -2

variableList.name: STYLE_SELECT_ARROW
variableList.children:
const STYLE_SELECT_ARROW = ({
  '&:after': {
    position: 'absolute',
    content: `\'\'`,
    width: 0,
    height: 0,
    borderLeft: '0.3125em solid transparent',
    borderRight: '0.3125em solid transparent',
    borderTop: '0.3125em solid',
    top: '50%',
    after: 0,
    marginTop: '-0.15625em',
    pointerEvents: 'none'
  }
})

ngModuleList.name: LyFieldModule
ngModuleList.children: import { LyFieldModule } from '@alyle/ui/field'

typeAliasList.name: LyHintAlign
typeAliasList.children: type LyHintAlign = 'before' | 'after'
